iana.encoding_considerations:
The media type encodes an LTE Positioning Protocol (LPP) message 
   (as specified in 3GPP TS 36.355).

Security considerations: The information transported in this media 
   type does not include active or executable content.

Interoperability considerations: The media type allows for 
   interoperability of LPP messages transmitted over Service Based 
   Interfaces (SBI).

   The LPP messages are sent over SBI between core network control 
   plane entities in 5G mobile networks.

iana.template_text:
(registered 2021-04-09, last updated 2021-04-09)

Media type name: application

Media subtype name: vnd.3gpp.lpp

Required parameters: N/A

Optional parameters: N/A

Encoding considerations: binary

   The media type encodes an LTE Positioning Protocol (LPP) message 
   (as specified in 3GPP TS 36.355).

Security considerations: The information transported in this media 
   type does not include active or executable content.

Interoperability considerations: The media type allows for 
   interoperability of LPP messages transmitted over Service Based 
   Interfaces (SBI).

   The LPP messages are sent over SBI between core network control 
   plane entities in 5G mobile networks.

Published specification: 

   3GPP TS 29.572 available at
   http://www.3gpp.org/ftp/Specs/html-info/29572.htm

Applications which use this media: Applications that exchanging LPP 
   messages over Service Based Interfaces (SBI).

Fragment identifier considerations: N/A

Restrictions on usage: N/A

Additional information:

   1. Deprecated alias names for this type: N/A
   2. Magic number(s): N/A
   3. File extension(s): N/A
   4. Macintosh file type code: N/A
   5. Object Identifiers: N/A

General Comments: N/A

Person to contact for further information:

   1. Name: Jones Lu Yunjie
   2. Email: jones.lu&ericsson.com

Intended usage: Common

   The exchange of LPP messages for location service is very common 
   in mobile networks.

Author/Change controller: 3GPP

   3GPP contact: Lionel Morand <lionel.morand&orange.com>
